Class GameSettings

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.config.GameSettings
public final class GameSettings extends Object
Immutable snapshot capturing the player's gameplay preferences (key bindings, DAS/ARR tuning, audio options).

Instances are produced via the GameSettings.Builder to guarantee sensible defaults and simple cloning into a mutable instance before persisting with GameSettingsStore.

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    GameSettings.Action
    Logical key-bindable actions supported by the UI.
    static final class 
    GameSettings.Builder
    Mutable builder with validation steps on every setter to guarantee sane persisted values.
    static enum 
    GameSettings.ColorAssistMode
    Color palette presets exposed in the settings dialog.
